function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey participants with less than 3 years of experience may lack the necessary expertise to provide accurate and reliable opinions and suggestions.","Impact":"Inaccurate data and suggestions may lead to ineffective decision-making in the construction and built environment sectors.","Mitigation":"Implement strict qualification criteria to ensure that only experienced individuals participate in the survey.","Technologies":"Qualification software and experience verification tools.","People":"Survey participants with less than 3 years of experience.","Owner":"Research team conducting the survey."},{"Description":"Inconsistent opinions and suggestions due to varying levels of experience among the participants.","Impact":"Difficulty in achieving consensus and identifying clear trends and patterns in the survey results.","Mitigation":"Conduct separate analyses for different experience groups and assign different weights based on experience level.","Technologies":"Data analysis and visualization tools for grouping and weighting responses.","People":"Survey participants with different levels of experience.","Owner":"Research team conducting the survey."},{"Description":"Risk of bias towards the opinions and suggestions of participants with longer experience, leading to the neglect of valuable input from less experienced participants.","Impact":"Neglecting innovative perspectives and up-to-date insights from younger professionals in the construction and built environment sectors.","Mitigation":"Establish a structured review process that ensures equal consideration of all opinions, regardless of experience level.","Technologies":"Collaborative review platforms and decision-making support tools.","People":"Participants with less experience and innovative perspectives.","Owner":"Research team conducting the survey."}]}
